newsitem.title: USA: Wall St stocks open slightly higher.
newsitem.headline: Wall St stocks open slightly higher.

text.p: U.S. stocks moved slightly higher after the opening of trading Tuesday morning, with quiet trading expected in a shortened session ahead of the Christmas holiday.
The Dow Industrials rose seven to 6,496 at the start. The Nasdaq Composite rose 1.98 to 1,281.41, while the S&P Index was up one at 748.
The 30-year bond was unchanged to yield 6.59 pct.
